name: Baked Potato Soup
author: Sara Snider
instructions: Bake potatoes until done. Cool, cut in half - lengthwise, scoop out pulp + set aside, melt butter in heavy saucepan over low heat. Add flour, stirring until smooth. Cook 5 mins, stirring constantly, gradually add milk, stirring over medium heat until thick and bubbly. Add potato pulp, salt & pepper, 2 tbsp green onions, 1/2 cup bacon & 1 cup cheese. Cook until heated thoroughly, and stir in sour cream. Add more milk if necessary but it should be served thick. Serve with remaining green onions, bacon, & cheese on top. Do net freeze but good for several days (add milk to cup to warm up)
